titleStmt.title: The first booke of the Christian exercise appertayning to resolution. VVherein are layed downe the causes & reasons that should moue a man to resolue hym selfe to the seruice of God: and all the impedimentes remoued, which may lett the same.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

notesStmt.note: Preface signed: R.P., i.e. Robert Parsons.
At foot of title: VVith priuylege.
Enlarged and revised by the author in 1585 as: A Christian directory.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
